title: The Empty pillow = Al-Wisada al-khalia = Illussions d'amour
creator_credit: Ramsis Naguib, Le Societe Arabe pour le Cinema, Arabic Cinema and Salah Abou Seif
brief_description: Romantic drama starring Abdel Halim Hafez as the young student Salah who falls in love with the innocent Samiha played by Lubna Abdel Aziz. However Samiha’s parents have other ideas - they want Samiha to marry the wealthy Dr Fouad. Desperate, Salah decides to take matters into his own hands with unexpected consequences. Photography by Mahmoud Nasr.
